comment._content:
Hello, gossips! It's fun to find present-day people gossiping about long-gone people. I'm related to the woman and man in this photo. The murder? suicide? mystery tale was passed down by the family but with spare detail. I've only recently been reading the accounts in various newspapers of the time. It made big news -- from New York to San Francisco to Canada.

I haven't seen this photo before! Remarkable. Yes, that's mother and son, Anna and Edgar. They and the young pastor who married Anna's daughter, Belle (my great-grandmother) were accused of murdering August Jacobson (Anna's husband), but acquitted. Well, you all have read the story...
